LanguageData.HeavyShieldBelts.label: Heavy Shield Belts
LanguageData.HeavyShieldBelts.description: Advances in repulsion field generators allow the use of stronger capacitors, granting increased maximum charge.
LanguageData.QRShieldBelts.label: Quick-Recharge Shield Belts
LanguageData.QRShieldBelts.description: Integration of nano-scale radioisotope generators into the repulsion field generator allows production of shields which recharge faster.
LanguageData.RangedShieldBelts.label: Ranged Shield Belts
LanguageData.RangedShieldBelts.description: Usage of advanced microchips grants greater processing power, allowing belts to differentiate between incoming and outgoing projectiles.
